French: La rébellion d'Ethem Toto
Spanish: The Rebellion of Ethem Toto

English: A revolt broke out in southern Albania. Its leader, Ethem Toto, had behind him many diverse elements opposed to King Zog for a variety of reasons. Some were Muslim conservatives opposed to his few social reforms, others were wary of the growing Italian influence in the country while others felt that northern and central Albania benefited from Zog's rule at the expense of the south. The revolt was defeated without much difficulty.
French: Des rebelles se sont soulevés en Albanie du Sud. Leur chef, Ethem Toto, était soutenu par de nombreux éléments opposés au roi Zogu pour des raisons diverses. Certains étaient des conservateurs musulmans opposés ?ses réformes sociales, d'autres s'inquiétaient de l'influence grandissante de l'Italie sur le pays, d'autres encores pensaient que l'Albanie du Nord et du Centre bénéficiait d'un traitement de faveur auprès du roi Zogu, au détriment du Sud. La révolte a ét?écrasée sans trop de difficultés.
Italian: A revolt broke out in southern Albania. Its leader, Ethem Toto, had behind him many diverse elements opposed to King Zog for a variety of reasons. Some were Muslim conservatives opposed to his few social reforms, others were wary of the growing Italian influence in the country while others felt that northern and central Albania benefited from Zog's rule at the expense of the south. The revolt was defeated without much difficulty.
Spanish: A revolt broke out in southern Albania. Its leader, Ethem Toto, had behind him many diverse elements opposed to King Zog for a variety of reasons. Some were Muslim conservatives opposed to his few social reforms, others were wary of the growing Italian influence in the country while others felt that northern and central Albania benefited from Zog's rule at the expense of the south. The revolt was defeated without much difficulty.
German: Es gab eine Revolte in Südalbanien. Sie wurde von Ethem Toto angeführt, der verschiedene Gruppen hinter sich vereinen konnte. Muslimische Konservative lehnten die sozialen Reformen von König Zog ab, andere misstrauten dem wachsenden Einfluss Italiens, während andere meinten, dass König Zog die Mitte und den Norden Albaniens auf Kosten des Südens bevorteilte. Die Revolte wurde ohne größere Schwierigkeiten niedergeschlagen.
Polish: A revolt broke out in southern Albania. Its leader, Ethem Toto, had behind him many diverse elements opposed to King Zog for a variety of reasons. Some were Muslim conservatives opposed to his few social reforms, others were wary of the growing Italian influence in the country while others felt that northern and central Albania benefited from Zog's rule at the expense of the south. The revolt was defeated without much difficulty.

Some were Muslim conservatives opposed to his few social reforms, others were wary of the growing Italian influence in the country while others felt that northern and central Albania benefited from Zog's rule at the expense of the south. The revolt was defeated without much difficulty.

Some were Muslim conservatives opposed to his few social reforms, others were wary of the growing Italian influence in the country while others felt that northern and central Albania benefited from Zog's rule at the expense of the south. French: Poursuite du Lend-Lease Act
Spanish: Establishing Further Lend Lease Shipments

English: The first shipment of Lend Lease has reached the United Kingdom. Further Lend Lease events will not occur while the USA is human controlled. It is recommended to establish trade convoys to the United Kingdom, the Republic of China and finally the Soviet Union in order to gift them 300 to 900 supplies a day in total. Also send them oil and other resources if they are short on them.
French: Le premier convoi honorant les accords de prêt-bail est parvenu au Royaume-Uni. Aucun envoi supplémentaire n'aura lieu tant que les USA seront contrôlés par un joueur humain. Il est recommand?d'établir des convois commerciaux en direction du Royaume-Uni, de la Chine nationaliste et de l'URSS, pour l'équivalent de 300 ?900 unités de ravitaillement par jour. L'envoi de pétrole et d'autres ressources est également souhaitable si ces pays viennent ?en manquer.
Italian: The first shipment of Lend Lease has reached the United Kingdom. Further Lend Lease events will not occur while the USA is human controlled. It is recommended to establish trade convoys to the United Kingdom, the Republic of China and finally the Soviet Union in order to gift them 300 to 900 supplies a day in total. Also send them oil and other resources if they are short on them.

Also send them oil and other resources if they are short on them.
German: Die erste Leih&Pacht-Sendung hat Großbritannien erreicht. Zu weiteren Leih&Pacht Ereignissen wird es nicht kommen, solange die USA vom Menschen gesteuert werden. Erstelle Handelsconvoys nach Großbritannien, zur Republik China und letztlich auch zur Sowjetunion, um ihnen zusammen 300 bis 900 Nachschub täglich zu schenken. Sende ihnen auch Öl und andere Resourcen, falls diese benötigt werden.
